trans_title: 狂野俄罗斯 第二季
introduction: This iconic and landmark series explores Russia’s most mysterious and amazing locations and most iconic wildlife. Covering an expanse of over 6.6 million square miles Russia is epic in its scale.  From east to west, via mountains, volcanoes, deserts, lakes and Arctic ice, its extremes are awe-inspiring.Russia’s incredible wildlife inhabits terrain that extends across 12 time zo...
